description.english: Force an innocent demon into indentured servitude.
description.french: Contraignez un démon innocent à une existence de servitude.
description.german: Zwingt einen arglosen Dämon in die Sklaverei.
description.italian: Obbliga un demone innocente a vincolarsi come servitore.
description.polish: Zmu niewinnego demona do przymusowej s³u¿by.
description.spanish: Obliga a un demonio inocente a firmar un contrato de servidumbre.
description.koreana: 무고한 악마와 강제로 노예 계약을 맺으십시오.
description.russian: Закабалить невинного демона.
description.schinese: 强迫一个无辜的恶魔做契约奴役。

description.english: Collect 30 crab dung.
description.french: Ramassez 30 fumiers de crabe.
description.german: Sammelt 30 Einheiten Krabbenmist.
description.italian: Recupera 30 pezzi di sterco di granchio.
description.polish: Zbierz 30 porcji krabiego ³ajna.
description.spanish: Recoge 30 heces de cangrejo.
description.russian: Собрать 30 шт. крабьего помета.
description.schinese: 收集 30 坨蟹粪。

description.english: Collect 30 Moonsilver shards.
description.french: Ramassez 30 éclats de sélène.
description.german: Sammelt 30 Mondsilber-Splitter.
description.italian: Recupera 30 frammenti di Lunargento.
description.polish: Zbierz 30 od³amków ksiê¿ycowego srebra.
description.spanish: Recoge 30 fragmentos de plata de luna.
description.russian: Собрать 30 осколков лунного серебра.
description.schinese: 收集 30 个银月钢碎片。

description.english: Hire a new mercenary.
description.french: Recrutez un nouveau mercenaire.
description.german: Heuert einen neuen Söldner an.
description.italian: Recluta un nuovo mercenario.
description.polish: Wynajmij nowego najemnika.
description.spanish: Contrata a un nuevo mercenario.
description.russian: Нанять наемника.
description.schinese: 雇用一名新的雇佣兵。

description.english: Get drunk with Yria.
description.french: Saoulez-vous avec Yria.
description.german: Betrinkt Euch mit Yria.
description.italian: Ubriacati con Yria.
description.polish: Upij siê wraz z Yri¹.
description.spanish: Emborráchate con Yria.
description.russian: Напиться с Ирией.
description.schinese: 与伊利娅一起大醉一场。

description.english: Learn how to summon titans.
description.french: Apprenez à invoquer des titans.
description.german: Erlernt die Beschwörung von Titanen.
description.italian: Impara ad evocare i titani.
description.polish: Naucz siê, jak przyzywaæ tytanów.
description.spanish: Aprende a invocar titanes.
description.russian: Научиться призывать титанов.
description.schinese: 学习如何召唤泰坦。

description.english: Successfully impersonate an arrogant architect when entering Windholme.
description.french: Faites-vous passer pour un architecte arrogant en arrivant à Windholme.
description.german: Gebt Euch erfolgreich als arroganter Architekt aus, um Windholme zu betreten.
description.italian: Impersona con successo un arrogante architetto mentre entri a Windholme.
description.polish: Z powodzeniem udawaj aroganckiego architekta przy wejciu do Wietrznej Jamy.
description.spanish: Hazte pasar por una leyenda de la arquitectura al entrar en Windholme.
description.koreana: 윈드홀름에 들어갈 때 오만한 건축가 흉내를 내십시오.
description.russian: Успешно выдать себя за наглого архитектора на въезде в Виндхольм.
description.schinese: 在进入温德霍尔梅时成功假扮成一名傲慢的建筑师。

description.english: Upgrade your Empyrian trinket to its full potential.
description.french: Améliorez votre babiole empyrienne au maximum de son potentiel.
description.german: Bessert Euren empyrischen Glücksbringer zu seinem vollen Potential auf.
description.italian: Porta il monile empyriano al suo pieno potenziale.
description.polish: Ulepsz swoj¹ empyriañsk¹ pami¹tkê do pe³ni mocy.
description.spanish: Mejora tu abalorio empyriano a su máximo potencial.
description.russian: Раскрыть полный потенциал вашего эмпирийского сувенира.
description.schinese: 将你的安皮里亚升级饰品，发挥它的全部潜能。

description.english: Complete all WANTED poster missions from the blackboard in Greykeep.
description.french: Accomplissez toutes les missions des avis de recherche affichés sur le tableau noir de Fort-Gris.
description.german: Schließt alle 'Gesucht'-Missionen vom Schwarzen Brett in Grauschanze ab.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni RICERCATO affisse alla bacheca di Fortezza Grigia.
description.polish: Ukoñcz wszystkie misje z listami goñczymi z tablicy w Szarej Twierdzy.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de los carteles de SE BUSCA del tablón de anuncios de la Fortaleza Gris.
description.koreana: 그레이킵의 게시판에 있는 모든 지명 수배 벽보 임무를 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Выполнить все задания по розыску с доски объявлений в Серой Цитадели.
description.schinese: 完成灰堡黑板上的所有通缉告示任务。

description.english: Equip your avatar with an artefact item in every possible slot.
description.french: Équipez votre avatar avec un artefact dans tous les emplacements disponibles.
description.german: Stattet Euren Avatar mit einem Artefakt in jedem Slot aus.
description.italian: Equipaggia il tuo avatar con un manufatto in ogni slot possibile.
description.polish: Wyposa¿ swoj¹ postaæ w artefakty we wszystkich mo¿liwych slotach.
description.spanish: Equipa tu avatar con un artefacto en cada ranura posible.
description.koreana: 아바타의 모든 슬롯에 유물 아이템을 장비하십시오.
description.russian: Заполнить артефактными предметами все возможные ячейки вашего аватара.
description.schinese: 在所有可能的栏位用一件神器物品装备你的角色。

description.english: Get promoted to General of the Wolf Guard.
description.french: Obtenez la promotion de Général de la Garde du Loup.
description.german: Werdet zum General der Wolfsgarde berufen.
description.italian: Ottieni la promozione e diventa generale della Guardia del Lupo.
description.polish: Awansuj na genera³a Wilczej Stra¿y.
description.spanish: Consigue que te asciendan a general de la Guardia del Lobo.
description.russian: Стать генералом Волчьей Стражи.
description.schinese: 晋升为狼卫上将。

description.english: First dates can be a scary affair.
description.french: Les premiers rendez-vous sont parfois intimidants...
description.german: Das erste Mal Ausgehen kann die Nerven belasten.
description.italian: Alle volte i primi appuntamenti possono rivelarsi spaventosi.
description.polish: Pierwsza randka potrafi napêdziæ stracha.
description.spanish: Las primeras citas pueden dar miedo.
description.russian: Первые свидания – страшная вещь...
description.schinese: 初次约会有时是件可怕的事情。

description.english: Use a potion to reset your skills and attributes.
description.french: Utilisez une potion pour réinitialiser vos compétences et caractéristiques.
description.german: Nutzt einen Trank, um Eure Fertigkeiten und Attribute zurückzusetzen.
description.italian: Utilizza una pozione per ripristinare le tua abilità e caratteristiche iniziali.
description.polish: U¿yj eliksiru, by zresetowaæ swoje umiejêtnoci i atrybuty.
description.spanish: Usa una poción para restablecer tus habilidades y atributos.
description.russian: Сбросить все навыки и характеристики с помощью зелья.
description.schinese: 使用药剂重置你的技能和属性。

description.english: Destroy all vengeful spirits.
description.french: Anéantissez tous les esprits vengeurs.
description.german: Vernichtet alle rachsüchtigen Geister
description.italian: Distruggi tutti gli spiriti in cerca di vendetta.
description.polish: Zniszcz wszystkie mciwe duchy.
description.spanish: Destruye a todos los espíritus vengativos.
description.russian: Уничтожить всех мстительных духов.
description.schinese: 摧毁所有复仇之魂。

description.english: Have all possible companions in your party at least once.
description.french: Recrutez une fois au moins tous les compagnons dans votre groupe.
description.german: Habt alle möglichen Begleiter wenigstens einmal in Eurer Gruppe.
description.italian: Disponi di tutti i compagni possibili all'interno del tuo gruppo almeno una volta.
description.polish: Miej w dru¿ynie ka¿dego z potencjalnych kompanów przynajmniej raz.
description.spanish: Ten a todos los compañeros posibles en tu equipo al menos una vez.
description.koreana: 가능한 모든 동료를 최소 한 번은 일행에 참여시키십시오.
description.russian: Собрать всех возможных спутников (не обязательно всех сразу).
description.schinese: 在你的队伍中所有可能结为同伴的队友（至少一次）。

description.english: Upgrade one of your abilities to the highest level.
description.french: Améliorez une de vos compétences au niveau maximum.
description.german: Steigert alle Eure Fähigkeiten auf die höchste Stufe.
description.italian: Potenzia una delle tue abilità fino al massimo livello raggiungibile.
description.polish: Ulepsz jedn¹ ze swoich zdolnoci do maksymalnego poziomu.
description.spanish: Mejora una de tus habilidades al nivel más alto.
description.russian: Улучшить одну из ваших способностей до максимума.
description.schinese: 将你的一项技能升至满级。

description.english: Raise an attribute above the natural maximum of 10.
description.french: Augmentez une compétence au-delà du maximum naturel de 10.
description.german: Erhöht ein Attribut über das natürliche Maximum von 10 hinaus.
description.italian: Porta una caratteristica oltre il suo massimo naturale, pari a 10.
description.polish: Podwy¿sz jeden z atrybutów powy¿ej naturalnego maksimum: 10.
description.spanish: Aumenta un atributo por encima del máximo natural de 10.
description.koreana: 능력치 하나를 통상적 최대치인 10 이상으로 올리십시오.
description.russian: Улучшить характеристику сверх естественного максимума в 10.
description.schinese: 将一项属性升至自然上限10以上。

description.english: Find all fractures in the Veil and use the Vinculum on them.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les déchirures dans le Voile et utilisez le Vinculum sur elles.
description.german: Findet alle Frakturen im Schleier und wendet das Vinculum auf sie an.
description.italian: Trova tutte le fratture del Velo e usa il vinculum su ognuna.
description.polish: Znajd wszystkie szczeliny w Zas³onie i u¿yj na nich Ogniwa.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las fracturas del Velo y usa el vínculum en ellas.
description.koreana: 장막 속의 모든 균열을 찾아 그곳에 유대 장치를 사용하십시오.
description.russian: Найти все разломы в Завесе и использовать на них винкулум.
description.schinese: 找到帷幕的所有裂痕，在上面使用绶带。

description.english: Earn gold by selling your unwanted loot.
description.german: Verdient Gold, indem Ihre Eure überzählige Beute verkauft.
description.french: Obtenez de lor en vendant le butin dont vous ne voulez pas.
description.italian: Guadagna dell'oro vendendo il bottino che non desideri tenere.
description.spanish: Gana oro vendiendo el botín que no quieras.
description.schinese: 出售不想要的战利品赚取金币。
description.russian: Заработать золото продажей ненужных трофеев.
description.polish: Zarób z³oto na sprzeda¿y niepotrzebnych ³upów.

description.english: Finish the Soul Harvest campaign on Circle Mage difficulty without lowering it once.
description.french: Terminez la campagne Moisson dâmes au niveau de difficulté Mage du Cercle, sans jamais réduire la difficulté.
description.german: Schließt die Soul Harvest-Kampagne auf dem Schwierigekeitsgrad Zirkelmagus ab, ohne die Schwierigkeit auch nur einmal zu senken.
description.italian: Porta a termine la campagna Soul Harvest con difficoltà Mago del Cerchio senza mai abbassarla.
description.polish: Ukoñcz dodatek ¯niwa Dusz na poziomie trudnoci Mag Krêgu, ani razu nie obni¿aj¹c poziomu trudnoci.
description.spanish: Termina la campaña Soul Harvest en la dificultad Mago del Círculo sin bajarla ni una vez.
description.koreana: 한 번도 난이도를 낮추지 않고 원탁회 마법사 난이도에서 소울 하베스트 캠페인을 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Пройти кампанию Soul Harvest на сложности 'Маг Круга', ни разу не понизив ее.
description.schinese: 以圆桌议会法师难度（不降级）完成灵魂收割战役。

description.english: Who needs graphics anyway?
description.french: Les graphismes, cest très surfait, de toute façon.
description.german: Wer braucht denn schon gute Grafik?
description.italian: Chi ha bisogno della grafica, in ogni caso?
description.polish: Kto by siê przejmowa³ grafik¹?
description.spanish: ¿Quién necesita gráficos buenos?
description.russian: Кому нужна эта ваша графика?
description.schinese: 谁还需要图片？

description.english: Cause all of Eo to be destroyed.
description.french: Provoquez la destruction dÉo
description.german: Lasst die Vernichtung von ganz Eo zu.
description.italian: Causa la distruzione di tutta Eo.
description.polish: Sprowad na Eo zag³adê.
description.spanish: Haz que todo Eo sea destruido.
description.russian: Стать причиной гибели всей Эо.
description.schinese: 导致整个埃欧大陆毁灭。

description.english: Sacrifice yourself to the God of Light.
description.french: Sacrifiez-vous au Dieu de la Lumière.
description.german: Opfert Euch dem Gott des Lichts.
description.italian: Sacrificati al Dio della Luce.
description.polish: Ofiaruj siê bogu wiat³a.
description.spanish: Sacrifícate al Dios de la Luz.
description.russian: Принести себя в жертву Богу света.
description.schinese: 把自己献祭给光明之神。

description.english: Read all the writings of the Hybernian scholar.
description.french: Lisez tous les écrits de lérudit hybernien.
description.german: Lest alle Schriften des Hybernischen Gelehrten.
description.italian: Leggi tutti gli scritti dello studioso iberniano.
description.polish: Przeczytaj wszystkie zapiski hyberniañskiego badacza.
description.spanish: Lee todos los escritos del erudito hyberniano.
description.russian: Прочесть все работы гибернийского ученого.
description.schinese: 读完海博尼亚学士的所有著作。

description.english: Use a vinculum for the first time.
description.french: Utilisez un Vinculum pour la première fois.
description.german: Verwendet das erste Mal ein Vinculum.
description.italian: Usa il vinculum per la prima volta.
description.polish: U¿yj Ogniwa po raz pierwszy.
description.spanish: Usa un vínculum por primera vez.
description.russian: Впервые использовать винкулум.
description.schinese: 首次使用绶带。

description.english: Finish the first dream.
description.french: Terminez le premier rêve.
description.german: Schließt den ersten Traum ab.
description.italian: Termina il primo sogno.
description.polish: Ukoñcz pierwszy sen.
description.spanish: Termina el primer sueño.
description.russian: Завершить первый сон.
description.schinese: 完成第一个梦境。

description.english: Complete all hunting quests for the smith in Windholme.
description.french: Accomplissez toutes les quêtes de chasse pour le forgeron de Windholme.
description.german: Schließt alle Jagdaufträge für den Schmied in Windholme ab.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni di caccia per il fabbro di Windholme.
description.polish: Ukoñcz wszystkie polowania zlecone przez kowala z Wietrznej Jamy.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de caza del herrero de Windholme.
description.koreana: 윈드홀름의 대장장이를 위해 모든 사냥 퀘스트를 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Выполнить все охотничьи задания для кузнеца в Виндхольме.
description.schinese: 完成温德霍尔梅铁匠的所有猎捕任务。

description.english: Complete all hunting quests for the smith in Cahlabrok
description.french: Accomplissez toutes les quêtes de chasse pour le forgeron de Cahlabrok.
description.german: Schließt alle Jagdaufträge für den Schmied in Cahlabrok ab.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni di caccia per il fabbro di Cahlabrok
description.polish: Ukoñcz wszystkie polowania zlecone przez kowala z Cahlabrok.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de caza del herrero de Cahlabrok
description.koreana: 캘라브록의 대장장이를 위해 모든 사냥 퀘스트를 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Выполнить все охотничьи задания для кузнеца в Калаброке.
description.schinese: 完成卡拉布洛克铁匠的所有猎捕任务。

description.english: Successfully open the combination lock on a treasure chest in Windwall Outskirts.
description.french: Ouvrez la serrure à combinaison dun coffre au trésor dissimulé aux abords de Chutevent.
description.german: Öffnet das Kombinationsschloss einer Schatzkiste im Windwaller Vorland.
description.italian: Apri il lucchetto a combinazione di un forziere nei Sobborghi di Muravento.
description.polish: Otwórz zamek z szyfrem w skrzyni skarbów na obrze¿ach Gór Wietrznych.
description.spanish: Abre con éxito la cerradura de un cofre del tesoro a las afueras del Muro del Viento.
description.koreana: 윈드월 외곽의 보물 상자에 달린 번호 자물쇠를 여십시오.
description.russian: Открыть кодовый замок на сундуке с сокровищами на Окраине Виндвала.
description.schinese: 成功解锁齐云山郊外一个宝箱上的组合锁。

description.english: Successfully defuse a dangerous situation using nothing but words.
description.french: Désamorcez une situation dangereuse en utilisant uniquement des paroles.
description.german: Entschärft eine angespannte Situation mit nichts weiter als Worten.

description.polish: Z powodzeniem rozwi¹¿ niebezpieczn¹ sytuacjê za pomoc¹ s³ów.
description.spanish: Sal con éxito de una situación peligrosa solo con el poder de la palabra.
description.russian: Разрулить конфликт одними лишь словами.

description.english: Use all possible charms in the Blood Pit.

description.german: Setzt alle verfügbaren Glücksbringer in der Blutgrube ein.

description.polish: U¿yj wszystkich dostêpnych talizmanów na arenie.

description.russian: Использовать все возможные талисманы в Кровавой Яме.

description.english: Play the campaign in co-op mode.

description.english: Summon creatures to aid you in battle.
description.german: Beschwört Kreaturen, um Euch in der Schlacht zu unterstützen.
description.french: Invoquez des créatures pour vous aider au combat.
description.italian: Evoca delle creature che ti aiutino in battaglia.
description.spanish: Invoca criaturas para que te ayuden en la batalla.
description.schinese: 召唤生灵助战。
description.russian: Призывать существ на свою сторону в бою.
description.polish: Przywo³aj istoty do pomocy w walce.

description.english: Use your heroes’ abilities to heal the wounds of your allies.
description.german: Verwendet die Fähigkeiten Eures Helden, um die Wunden Eurer Verbündeten zu heilen.
description.french: Utilisez les compétences de vos héros pour soigner les blessures de vos alliés.
description.italian: Usa le abilità dei tuoi eroi per guarire le ferite dei tuoi alleati.
description.koreana: 영웅들의 능력을 사용하여 아군의 상처를 치유하십시오.
description.spanish: Usa las habilidades de tus héroes para curar las heridas de tus aliados.
description.schinese: 用英雄技能治愈盟友。
description.russian: Использовать способности ваших героев для исцеления союзников.
description.polish: Skorzystaj ze zdolnoci swoich bohaterów, aby uleczyæ rany twoich sojuszników.

description.english: Solve an ancient puzzle.
description.french: Résolvez une énigme ancienne.
description.german: Löst ein uraltes Rätsel.
description.italian: Risolvi un antico enigma.
description.polish: Rozwi¹¿ staro¿ytn¹ ³amig³ówkê.
description.spanish: Resuelve un rompecabezas ancestral.
description.russian: Разгадать древнюю головоломку.
description.schinese: 解开一道古老的谜题。

description.english: You won the battle for Theresa’s Meadows and put an end to the debacherous Oktoberfest rites.
description.german: Ihr habt die Schlacht um die Theresienwiese gewonnen und der Unzucht auf dem Oktoberfest ein Ende gesetzt!
description.french: Vous avez remporté la bataille de la Theresienwiese et mis un terme aux rites dépravés de l’Oktoberfest.
description.italian: Hai vinto la battaglia dei Prati di Teresa e messo fine agli sfrenati riti dell'Oktoberfest.
description.koreana: 테레사의 초원 전투에서 승리하여 방탕한 옥토버페스트 의식에 종지부를 찍었습니다.
description.spanish: Has ganado la batalla del Prado de Teresa y has puesto fin a los disolutos ritos del Oktoberfest.
description.schinese: 你赢得了特蕾莎草地之战，结束了啤酒节上的野蛮仪式。
description.russian: Вы победили в сражении за Луг Терезы и положили конец оголтелому непотребству Октоберфеста.
description.polish: Udało ci się wygrać bitwę o Polanę Teresy i położyć kres rozpustnym rytuałom Oktoberfestu.
